costs.components: A small piece of unwholesome flesh

effect.description: Allows the caster to see out of another's eye socket. The target's eye must first be removed and replaced with a piece of unwholesome flesh. Over 1D10 hours a new eye grows. Once complete, the caster can meditate to see through it. After 1D6+1 days, the eye explodes causing 1D8+2 damage.

Activates hidden mi-go modifications in a target. Caster concentrates for minutes equal to MP expended. Each MP provides +5% chance of success. Requires opposed POW roll if target is unwilling. Causes serious side effects ranging from bad dreams to sanity loss and stat changes.

Moderates or exacerbates weather. Every 10 MP changes one level of weather (Cloud Cover, Wind Direction, Wind Speed, Temperature, Precipitation). Base radius is 2 miles; +10 MP per additional mile. Lasts 30 minutes per 10 MP.
Dreamlands only. Dispels certain magic spells being maintained by MP expenditure within earshot. Beings brought by Call or Summon spells must make opposed POW roll or be forced back.

spell_entry.name: Animate Flesh Thing

effect.description: Animates dead skin and flesh into a sentient mass able to attack. 1 MP per 5 SIZ points animated. Lives for 24 hours unless killed, then melts into oily smear.
effect.damage: Varies by size (Flesh Thing stats: 1D4 damage + smother)

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Greater expenditure of magic points (5 per 5 SIZ points) can increase the potency and abilities of the creature.

spell_entry.name: Animate Mummy

effect.description: Animates a prepared mummy. The mummy has double its life STR, 1.5x CON, and 2/3 DEX. Retains skills and spells.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: With a 40-day ritual, the caster may perform full mummification on a deceased human and bring them to life.

effect.description: Allows anthropomorphic creatures to appear human. Generates illusory APP of 3D6x5. Each extra MP adds 1D3x5 APP. Lasts hours equal to 1/5th caster's POW. Flaws may appear (1D100 roll vs remaining MPx5).

Transfers life essence into vital organs which are then removed and hidden. Grants invulnerability to specific attacks (e.g. lung removal prevents drowning). Brain cannot be removed. Death only occurs if brain is destroyed.
Fills target's mind with a 3D map of any maze/labyrinth entered. Target cannot get lost. Duration: Sunrise to midnight following casting. Unwilling targets resist with POW.

spell_entry.name: Ascend the Stairs of Immortality
alternate_names: Sense Pathway to the Realm of Elder Beings
Locate Expanse of Those Who Dwell Elsewhere

effect.description: Meditate for 6 hours with Elixir. Grants innate sense of when/where the Ivory Stair (portal to Elder realm) will appear. Prophetic knowledge valid for 3 weeks.

spell_entry.name: Assist Dreamer

effect.description: Cast in Waking World upon sleeping. Catapults dreamer directly to the Vale of Pnath in the Dreamlands.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Variations exist allowing travel to specific Dreamlands locations.

spell_entry.name: Attract Fish
alternate_names: Gather the Abundance of the Sea

effect.description: Summons 1D100 local fish to the location within 1 hour.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Deep One variant uses a talisman instead of blood bait. May attract less wholesome things.

spell_entry.name: Attune Crystal

effect.description: Prepares a crystal for the Activation spell. Every 5 POW invested grants +10% success chance for Activation. Lasts as long as caster lives.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Using mi-go crystal grants +20% success per 5 POW.

effect.description: Grants portents of the future. Chance of understanding is roll <= POW. Portents may be vague or cryptic.

spell_entry.name: Awake Abhoth
alternate_names: Threefold Ritual of Awakening the Feaster

effect.description: Awakens the Great Old One Abhoth. Takes the form of three rituals proving faithfulness. Outcomes are uncertain.
Brings vision of Chuma (Yibb-Tstll) from Dreamlands. Chance of success = 10% per 8 MP. Yibb-Tstll's blood drains sacrifice's POW. Manifests in body when POW reaches 0.
effect.damage: 5 POW drain per 30 mins to sacrifice

effect.description: Summons chthonians to burrow/dance, causing earthquakes. 5 MP per Richter scale point. Chance of Shudde M'ell appearing if scale > 5.

costs.components: Pound of human flesh (consumed by target)

effect.description: Transforms human into animal permanently over 1D6+2 days. Target must eat human flesh. Caster must win opposed POW. Target loses INT and Sanity as they transform.
Ritual to augment POW. Daily meditation for 1 month. Extreme POW roll at end. Success: +5 POW, +5 SAN, age 5 years. Failure: No benefit.

spell_entry.name: Awaking/Dispelling the God Within
alternate_names: Imbue Kernel of the Child of Destiny

effect.description: Implants star-seed in creature. 5% success per MP. +10% with Music roll. Seed grows, absorbing host, then bursts forth. Reversal ritual exists to purge seed.
Dreamlands only. Silvery thread strikes target. Molten lead runs through bones. Target incapacitated. 3D10 CON loss per round maintained.
Dreamlands only. Casts a bolt of blue flame that does not burn but shocks with cold energy. Inflicts 1D6+2 damage. Ignores physical armor.
Enchants an object (book, gem, etc.) to seem incredibly desirable. Anyone viewing it must make a POW roll or be compelled to seize it. Lasts 1D6 hours.
Banishes a summoned entity back to its home dimension. Caster spends 1 MP for every 10 POW of the creature. Requires an opposed POW roll. The creature vanishes instantly if successful.

Creates an invisible barrier around the caster or target. Anyone attempting to cross it or attack the protected person physically suffers wracking pain (penalty die on all actions). Lasts 1D6+4 rounds.
Turns the caster's body insubstantial and invisible. They can pass through solid objects but cannot interact with the physical world. Lasts for 1D6+1 minutes or until dismissed.

spell_entry.name: Bespeak the End of the Day

effect.description: Allows the caster to see the moment of their own death or the end of the world (if imminent). The vision is often abstract or symbolic. Provides no context, just the imagery.

Forces the target to perceive the true nature of the cosmos for a split second. Target loses 1/1D6 Sanity and gains +1 Cthulhu Mythos skill. If they go temporarily insane, they gain a specific insight.

spell_entry.name: Bind Enemy

effect.description: paralyzes a target. Caster matches POW vs Target's POW. If successful, target cannot move or act physically. Caster must concentrate to maintain. Target can attempt POW roll each round to break free.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: If 20+ MP are spent, the binding becomes physical, manifesting as ghostly chains or vines that hold the target even if the caster's concentration breaks.

spell_entry.name: Bind Soul

effect.description: Captures the soul of a dying creature into a vessel. The soul is trapped indefinitely. The vessel can be destroyed to release the soul. Used often to interrogate the dead or power other spells.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: The caster can siphon MP from the trapped soul daily.

spell_entry.name: Black Binding

effect.description: Animates a corpse into a zombie servant. The zombie has stats based on its life but is mindless. Liquid poured into the mouth is essential. Requires the caster's blood in the mix.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: If performed on a consecrated altar, the zombie retains 1D6 INT and can follow complex orders.

effect.description: Enchants a box to summon a dimension-hopping entity when opened. The entity usually serves the opener for one task before vanishing.

spell_entry.name: Bless Blade

costs.components: Knife or dagger of pure metal (silver, iron, gold)

effect.description: Permanently enchants a blade to harm Mythos entities that are normally immune to physical damage. The blade does not gain extra damage, but bypasses immunity.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: If 10 POW is sacrificed, the blade inflicts +1D6 damage against Mythos entities.

spell_entry.name: Blight/Bless Crop

effect.description: Causes crops in a defined area to either wither and die overnight or grow with supernatural vigor and abundance. Can be used to starve a village or ensure prosperity.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Sacrificing a sentient being (POW 50+) during the ritual makes the effect permanent for that land.

effect.description: Induces a state of utter calm and euphoria in the target. Removes all fear, anxiety, and temporary insanity effects for 1D6 hours. Target is compliant and peaceful.
Causes the target's body to swell rapidly with gas and fluid. Target suffers 1D6 damage per 5 MP spent. If damage exceeds half max HP, skin bursts. Extremely painful and grotesque.

spell_entry.name: Body Warping of Gorgoroth

effect.description: Allows the caster to warp the physical form of the target. Can change facial features, lengthen limbs, or fuse digits. Permanent until reversed. Unwilling targets resist with CON.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Caster can grant functional natural weapons (claws/fangs) dealing 1D6 damage.

effect.description: Exhales a swarm of biting insects or a cloud of toxic gas. Causes 1D6 damage per 5 MP spent to all in the cone. Visually terrifying.
Fills the target's lungs with seawater. Target begins drowning immediately (CON rolls required to stay conscious/alive). Must be dispelled or water removed medically to survive.
Summons a massive sandstorm/dust storm. Visibility reduced to zero. Winds cause damage to structures. Lasts 1 hour.
Summons a swarm of pests (locusts, rats, flies) to infest an area. They devour crops and food stores. Can cause disease outbreak.
Rapidly sinks a corpse into the earth as if buried. The ground closes over it, leaving no trace. Useful for hiding evidence.
Enchants a bladed weapon to deal grievous wounds. Weapon deals +1D6 damage for 1D6 rounds. Wounds bleed profusely.

spell_entry.name: By the True Name Thy Power is Sapped

effect.description: Drains 3D6 POW from the target permanently. Target must make opposed POW roll. If failed, POW is lost. If reduced to 0, target dies.
Calls Ahtu, an avatar of Nyarlathotep. Requires a special amulet (three-lobed eye in flames) and self-mutilation.
Calls Aku-Shin Kage (Nyarlathotep avatar) into a blood-painted samurai armor. Requires moonless night. Avatar possesses the armor and bleeds.
effect.damage: 1 HP every 3 rounds to a victim

effect.description: Summons Arwassa on the first night of the new moon. Requires SIZ 500 sacrifice (including one human).

spell_entry.name: Call Avatar of The Skinless One

effect.description: Possesses an object or being with the avatar of The Skinless One for 24 hours. Possessed host gains horrific traits.

spell_entry.name: Call Azathoth
alternate_names: The Unspeakable Vowel of The Shaggai

effect.description: Extremely dangerous. Calls Azathoth. Likely destroys the caster/area unless appeased.

spell_entry.name: Call Bugg-Shash
alternate_names: Bring Forth He Who Comes in Darkness

effect.description: Summons Bugg-Shash. No dismissal spell exists. Will not leave without a victim.

spell_entry.name: Call Cthugha
alternate_names: Evocation of the Fiery Burning Doom

effect.description: Summons Cthugha via flame. Requires Fomalhaut visibility.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Variant 'Summon Cthugha' requires human sacrifice and falsely claims binding power.

effect.description: Summons Cyaegha. Requires sacrifice (manifests inside victim). Only works if imprisonment is broken or at specific sites.

spell_entry.name: Call Daoloth
alternate_names: Configuration of the Render of the Veils

effect.description: Summons Daoloth into the Pentacle of Planes. Requires icon, nightgaunt skull, black candles, metal rod. Failure risks possession/death.
Calls El Negro (Nyarlathotep avatar) to bargain.

spell_entry.name: Call Forth The Worm
alternate_names: Grant Form of One Thousand Slippery Crawlers

effect.description: Resurrects a dead person (dead 2+ weeks) as a Crawling One. Requires 10 hours of chanting.
Summons Ghatanothoa. Only works on Mu. Viewing the god causes petrification.

spell_entry.name: Call Gla'aki
alternate_names: Beseech the Master Beneath the Water

effect.description: Summons Gla'aki from water. Requires crystal shard if not at Brichester Lake.

spell_entry.name: Call Gol-Goroth
alternate_names: Call Out Master of the Stone

effect.description: Summons Gol-Goroth atop a monolith. Requires 1000-year-old stone, bonfires, dancing, blood sacrifice.

spell_entry.name: Call Hastur
alternate_names: The Darke Ritual of the One Who Walks in Shadow

effect.description: Calls Hastur. Requires 9 stone blocks in V-pattern. Only works when Aldebaran is visible. Byakhee grant bonus.

spell_entry.name: Call Horned Man
alternate_names: The Dance of Wisdom and Strife

effect.description: Summons the Horned Man (Nyarlathotep avatar). Chooses one summoner to 'dance' (grants +5 POW).
Summons Iod. Requires warding circle with pentagram to survive.

spell_entry.name: Call Ithaqua
alternate_names: The Seven Oaths of the North Wind

effect.description: Focuses Ithaqua. Requires 10ft snow mound. Freezing temperatures.
Calls Keeper of the Moonlens. Only works on specific nights in Goatswood. Requires sacrifice.

spell_entry.name: Call La Llorona
alternate_names: The Wailing Summons of the Drowner

effect.description: Calls La Llorona (Shub-Niggurath avatar). Night, waning moon. Requires designation of sacrifice.

spell_entry.name: Call Lightning

effect.description: Calls a bolt of lightning to strike a target (6D6 damage). Requires storm clouds.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Caster can bend elements with immediate effect (instantaneous).

effect.description: Rare spell. Summons M'guleloc. Requires sacrifice to avoid being eaten.

spell_entry.name: Call Mappo No Ry√ªjin
alternate_names: Abolish the Elder Seal and Unleash Leviathan Bringer of Destruction

effect.description: Calls the Great Dragon of Mappo. Requires Japanese Imperial Regalia, stone pillars, jade stones, and massive blood sacrifice.

spell_entry.name: Call Nyogtha
alternate_names: Petition Thy Dark Master Through the Rigorous Chanting and Wailing
Call Favor From HE Who Dwells Below

effect.description: Invokes Nyogtha for a boon.
Calls Ossadogowah. +25% if on stone tower. +10% if near marsh/frogs.

spell_entry.name: Call Rlim Shaikorth
alternate_names: Arise Visitation of the Ice God

effect.description: Calls Rlim Shaikorth.
Summons Saaitii. Requires sacrifice.

spell_entry.name: Call Shub-Niggurath
alternate_names: Bring Forth The Carnal Desire of the Wood Nymph

effect.description: Calls Shub-Niggurath. Requires consecrated altar, dark of the moon. Fresh blood grants bonus. Dark Young grant bonus.
Calls The Skinless One. Requires up to 100 human sacrifices. Each sacrifice grants +1% chance.

spell_entry.name: Call The Beast
alternate_names: Grand Rite of the Father of Terror

effect.description: Summons The Beast (Nyarlathotep avatar) into the Sphinx.
Summons 'The Black' (blood of Yibb-Tstll) to suffocate a target. Target makes CON rolls (increasing difficulty) or loses HP.

spell_entry.name: Call Yibb-Tstll
alternate_names: Summon Forth the Sleeper of Kled

effect.description: Calls Yibb-Tstll. Cast by 13 people at midnight on first day of year.
Summons Yig. Requires snakes/serpent folk (POW 500+ total) present.

spell_entry.name: Call Yog-Sothoth
alternate_names: The Forbidden Song of the Key

effect.description: Calls Yog-Sothoth. Requires stone tower, open area, cloudless sky, sacrifice.
Calls all zombies within 1 mile to the caster's circle. Zombies are held at circle's edge until dawn.
Calls Zu-Che-Quon. Requires three enchanted bells to be rung continuously.

spell_entry.name: Candle Communication

effect.description: Allows voice communication between two casters holding lit candles. Base 10 miles. +1 MP per 100 miles.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Up to four wizards may hold a simultaneous conversation/send images.

effect.description: Dreamlands only. Torrent of golden liquid drains 1D6 MP per 5 POW spent.
Creates a barrier against specific unnatural creatures (byakhee, deep ones, etc.). Costs 3 MP + 1 per person protected. Lasts 1 hour.

spell_entry.name: Cast Out Shan
alternate_names: Cleansing of the Most Foul Shaggai

effect.description: Expels a shan from a host. Requires pentagram and vervain. Pentagram wards against re-entry for 12 hours.
Frees a target from possession. Requires opposed POW roll.
Sends a demon to kill the recipient of a runic parchment. Demon appears after 2 weeks.
Inflicts feverish illness. Target loses 1D6 STR, CON, DEX per day for MP invested days. Requires item of target buried with poison.
Causes permanent blindness or cures it. Requires opposed POW roll.
Creates a vessel (art) for a Muse from Beyond. Requires Extreme Art/Craft success.
Increases mental faculties. Grants bonus die to intellectual problem solving.
Protects against Yig and his children. Requires casting at sunrise, midday, sunset.
Causes animal to treat caster as friend for 24 hours. Cannot command.

spell_entry.name: Chasm to Hell
alternate_names: Send Thy Neighbour to the Flames Below

effect.description: Opens a fissure to swallow the target. Creatures may emerge to drag them down.
Enchants a bell to absorb musical spells (Song of Hastur, etc.). Can release absorbed spell energy back at caster.
Creates protective circle. Approachers must win opposed POW or vomit/retreat. Requires 4 enchanted opals.
Prevents summoned beings from crossing. Opposed POW roll vs (MP x 5).
Drives back extra-dimensional entities. Group casting allowed. Opposed roll (MP x 5) vs POW.
Restores target to natural state. Removes curses, blights, foreign objects.

spell_entry.name: Cloak of Fire

effect.description: Wreathes caster in fire. Doubles MOV, bonus die to DEX. Attacks against caster have penalty die. Unarmed attackers take 1D6 damage. Touches deal 1D6 damage (caster takes half).

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Caster can unleash tentacle of flame (1D8 damage) for 6 MP.

spell_entry.name: Cloud Memory

effect.description: Blocks conscious memory of a specific event. Requires opposed POW roll.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Bonus die to POW roll for 10 extra MP.

spell_entry.name: Clutch of Nyogtha
alternate_names: The Insidious Wrath of the Dark Wizard

effect.description: Crushes target's heart (1D3 damage/round). Paralyzes target. Chest bursts at 0 HP. Requires concentration and MP expenditure.

spell_entry.name: Come and See Me
alternate_names: Instill the Leaping Flutters upon thy Heart's Desire

effect.description: Incites love in target. Requires candle with target's hair/nail. Caster gains +20 APP and bonus die to Charm/Persuade vs target.

spell_entry.name: Command Animal
alternate_names: Call Forth the Crawling Ones for Thy Bidding

effect.description: Commands specific animal species to obey one order. Specific per species.
Compels ghost to answer questions. Requires blood on grave. Opposed POW roll.

spell_entry.name: Command Plants
alternate_names: Bend Limb and Leaf to thy Will

effect.description: Controls plants (vines, branches). 2 MP per sq yard.

spell_entry.name: Command Shoggoth
alternate_names: Bind Creature of Darkness to Thy Will

effect.description: Compels shoggoth to obey one command. Cost doubles each repeat casting.
Seals target's mouth with flesh. Opposed POW roll.
Makes individual a zombie. Target must have soul bound. 1 MP per 10 rounds.
Dreamlands only. Creates barrier reducing damage by 6D6. Lasts 5 rounds.
Four part ritual to summon Turua (tentacled horror). Requires nature purification, egg in mouth, trance, sacrifice.
Views scenes from the past. Viewer loses 1D6 SAN. Requires scrying device and enchanted brazier.

spell_entry.name: Consume Likeness

effect.description: Assumes likeness of consumed person. Caster consumes victim. Reverts if injured.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Can recollect memories for additional MP.

effect.description: Absorbs memories/skills of consumed fresh brain for 24 hours.
Contacts Abhoth. Opposed POW roll. Success: telepathy/possession. Failure: coma.
Contacts Aku-Shin Kage. Appears as shadow. Possesses victim (bleeds).
Transports caster to Azathoth's Court. Hard POW roll. Failure = incineration.
Dreamlands only. Contacts Bokrug. Only responds if interested.
Contacts Byatis. Vision. POW roll to avoid hypnosis. Requires willingness to free deity.
Requires gorging on lavish meal. Sends visions/nightmares.
Attracts Child of Sphinx. Requires clay figurine and burning herbs.
Contacts Chthonian. Requires location with recent quakes.
Responds in dreams. May cause artistic mania.
Throw inscribed stones into water. Contacts Deep Ones.
Costs 1 MP instead of 5 POW. Appears in dream or person. Extracts 5 POW on first contact.
Chant to contact Elder Things.
Chant mantra 108 times. Vision of Green Lama. Answers 3 questions in riddles. Leaves obsession mark.
Contact Flying Polyps. Requires communication shaft.
Contacts Formless Spawn.
Contacts Ghouls. Moonlit old burial places.
Requires Astronomy roll. Attunes to Ghroth. High Sanity loss. No benefit.
Contacts Gla'aki. Usually sends servants first. Discusses servitude.
Contacts Gnoph-Keh. Requires Singing roll and ice effigy.
Contacts Hound. Mark space with geometric formulae. Dangerous.
Mi-Go spell. Telepathic link to human servant. Costs human 1 SAN per 5 rounds.
Stare into bright light. POW roll to avoid blindness. Iod speaks to mind.
Burn incense/diagrams. Hard Luck roll. Avatar visits at full moon.
Contacts lloigor in dreams. Demands 1D6 MP.
Contacts Ascended Masters of Shamballah.
Contacts Mi-Go.
Contacts Moon-Beasts. Often sends servants.
Contacts Nodens. Responds later. Aid is esoteric.
Contacts Nyarlathotep. Appears at gatherings or to individuals. Gifts have sting.
Contacts Nyarlatophis (Nyarlathotep avatar).
Rare spell. Contacts Othuyeg via dreams (28 days). SAN loss. POW roll or become obsessed.
Contacts Pazzuzu (Nyarlathotep avatar). Extreme POW roll. Deadly breath.
Contacts Rat-Things. Offerings required.
Contacts Sand-Dwellers.

spell_entry.name: Contact Servitor of The Outer Gods

effect.description: Contacts Servitor. Luck roll. Requires sacrifice. Performs one task.
Contacts Shub-Niggurath. Blood sacrifice. Sends herald.
Contacts dead. Tent with water jugs. Group casting.
Contacts Star-Spawn.
Contacts Tomb-Herd. Statues prepared.
Contacts Tsathoggua. Hazy vision.
Contacts Y'golonac. Desires servitude. May attack/possess.
Contacts Yig. Sacrifice drinks poison potion. Child of Yig bursts from stomach.
Contacts Yithian occupying subject.
Contacts Yog-Sothoth. Sacrifice offered. Risk of destruction.
Tcho-Tcho ritual. Two forms: Lesser Revelation (sacrifice) or True Communion (cannibalism).
Contacts Zoth-Ommog. Requires enchanted idol and blood sacrifice.
Controls earth, wind, fire, or water. 8 MP per 10 yards. Requires sample of element. Inflicts damage.
Melds skin of one body area. Opposed POW. Permanent for 5 POW.

spell_entry.name: Corruption of the Sacred
alternate_names: Gratification of the Seven Deadly Sins

effect.description: Attaches hungry ghost to target. Drains POW/SAN daily. Causes baser instincts.
Dust thrown in fire causes sleep (3D10 mins). Opposed POW.
Enchants gemstone amulet. Summons guardian once/24h (Heal 5 HP, +10 STR/CON/DEX/POW).
Creates barrier against zombies. Requires zombie intestine, flesh.

spell_entry.name: Create Barrier of Naach-Tith
alternate_names: The Unseen Sphere that Entraps the Demon

effect.description: Creates spherical barrier (100 yds). 3D10 STR per MP. Physical/Magical defense. Lasts 1D4+4 hours.
Amulet against possession for child. Lasts until age 14.
Enchants object for protection. Bonus die Luck/Dodge or Damage Reduction.
Creates animal-headed golem (Child of Sphinx). Requires Paut, animal head, living donor body.

spell_entry.name: Create Curse Tablet
alternate_names: Thine Enemies Treasures Transformed to Spit

effect.description: Curses fortune/money. Requires lead tablet buried underground. Opposed POW.
Enchants owl bone pipes. Used for Soul Singing/Pipes of Madness.
Enchants spear against undead. Requires human sacrifices. Destroys undead on impale.

spell_entry.name: Create Flesh Creeper
alternate_names: By thy Skin thy Breath is Sucked

effect.description: Creates Flesh Creeper from human flesh. Seeks target and asphyxiates.
Mythos Deity/Powerful Sorcerer version of Gate. Powered by creator.
Animates clay golem. Requires command word. Grows in size.

spell_entry.name: Create Mist of R'lyeh
alternate_names: The Dank Fog of Sailors Lost

effect.description: Creates dense mist obscuring vision.
Enchants glass to view past. Requires colored glass mosaic.
Slows aging and protects from damage. Ward-bag deflects damage equal to MP invested.

spell_entry.name: Create Sign of Barzai

effect.description: Creates emblem. Touch renders human (POW 105 or less) inactive.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Diagram error in Testament of Carnamagos.

effect.description: Summons normal storm. Obscures vision.
Creates zombie from living victim. Poison, bury alive, ritual. Zombie is conscious but obedient.
Animates corpse. Ritual liquid poured. Zombie rots.
Dreamlands only. Ages target 1D10 years. Loss of STR, CON, DEX.
Sauce causes cannibalistic nightmares. SAN loss.
Fashions crystal for calling Hastur. Permanent cost.
Dreamlands only. Glassy sphere protects caster from heat/cold. Immobile.
Inflicts physical/mental harm. Opposed POW. Loss of 10 characteristic points for 1 day.
Blocks celestial light. Reduces visibility to darkness/10 feet.

spell_entry.name: Curse of Chaugnar Faugn
alternate_names: The Blessed Touch of Chaugnar Faugn
Fevered Sleep of the Most Ancient Servants of the Blood

effect.description: Causes target to be devoured by Chaugnar Faugn. Visions lead to sacrifice. Requires flesh fragment.
Forces extra-planar being to return. Group casting.

spell_entry.name: Curse of the Putrid Husk
alternate_names: Summon Seven Devils to Afflict Thine Enemy
Wither the Mind of the Weak

effect.description: Illusion of rotting skin/organs falling out. 1D10 SAN loss. Opposed INT roll.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Illusion affects everyone (5 MP). Physical damage (20 MP, 25 POW, 20 SAN).

spell_entry.name: Curse of the Rat-Thing
alternate_names: Creation of the Rat Faced Servant

effect.description: Turns fresh corpse into Rat-Thing. Spirit settles in new body.
Causes hallucinations. Requires ensorcelled stone tablet. SAN loss.

Creates a zone of darkness centered on the caster. Each magic point expended increases the radius by 1 yard. From the third round of playing, all light is drained, blinding everyone nearby. Music must be continuous.

spell_entry.name: Death Spell

effect.description: Causes a victim to blister and eventually burst into flames. Requires opposed POW roll each round. Round 1: 1D3 damage (blisters). Round 2: 1D6 damage. Round 3+: 1D10 damage (bursts into flames).

spell_entry.deeper_magic: A prolonged version costs 34 MP and requires a personal item of the target. It kills over days, increasing damage by 2 points each day until death.

spell_entry.name: Death's Breath
alternate_names: The Caressing Icy Hands of Hell

effect.description: Exudes a dense shadowy mist that obscures vision, douses small lights, benumbs touch and hearing, and freezes the sense of smell. Lasts 1D10+5 rounds.
Caster invokes Secret Names and holds out a hand. Attacks are deflected by spending MP equal to the damage rolled. Can deflect multiple attacks until hand is dropped or MP runs out.

spell_entry.name: Deflection

effect.description: Dreamlands only. Knocks aside offensive spells targeted at the caster. Requires opposed POW roll against the attacker.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Caster may redirect the deflected spell to another target within sight.

spell_entry.name: Defy Gravity

effect.description: Reorients gravity for the caster by 90 or 180 degrees for 4D6 rounds. Allows walking on walls or ceilings.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Can affect those within 10 feet. A super-powered version allegedly can fling a caster into space.

spell_entry.name: Demon Senses

effect.description: Doubles hearing or visual acuity. Grants bonus die to Listen or Spot Hidden for 1 hour.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Spend 10 MP to enhance both senses. Variant attunes caster to the spirit realm/invisible entities.

spell_entry.name: Destroy Spawn of Yig

effect.description: Withers and dies un-hatched or recently hatched spawn of Yig. Requires Art/Craft (Singing) roll. Egg/spawn must have been exposed to sunlight.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Caster may be cursed by Yig (serpent mark, snake tongue, etc.).

spell_entry.name: Detect Enchantment
alternate_names: Discover the Machinations of the Devil

effect.description: Detects active curses or harmful enchantments on humans, animals, or crops. Causes tearing pain in caster's stomach if detected.
Reverses Transfer Body Part. Opposed POW roll. Borrowed organs/limbs fall off the target, usually causing death.

spell_entry.name: Devolution
alternate_names: The Wicked Curse of the Beast

effect.description: Dreamlands only. Opposed POW roll. Target transforms into an animal-like thing over 1D6 rounds and attacks blindly for 1D6 rounds.

spell_entry.name: Dho Formula

effect.description: Grants visions of distant locales or times. Hard POW roll required. Specific mantras target specific places (e.g., R'lyeh, Dreamlands, Azathoth's Court).

spell_entry.deeper_magic: The 'Hna Formula' supposedly allows physical travel to the viewed location.

effect.description: Whips revelers into a frenzy. Witnesses must make opposed POW roll or dance heedlessly for 1D10 hours. Hard CON roll each hour or collapse.
Frees the soul from the body. Can be cast on another (Opposed POW). Spirit is connected by a silver cord. Can sense/combat other spirits. If spirit destroyed, body dies.
Dismisses a deity. 1 MP per 25 POW of deity opens the way (5% chance). Further MP adds 5% chance per point. Group casting allowed.
Forces a spirit/ghost to return to its origin. Caster spends MP equal to spirit's magic points (1/5 POW). Opposed POW roll.
Dreamlands only. Target's bones vanish (Opposed POW). Victim collapses into a quivering heap of flesh.
Caster and 4 assistants chant to Yog-Sothoth over a bowl of water with blood. Viewers make POW roll to see a glimpse of their future.
Bends target's will to the caster for 1 round. Opposed POW roll. Commands must be intelligible. Can be recast.

spell_entry.name: Dowsing

effect.description: Locates a specific substance (water, gold, etc.) using a fetish (enchanted for 4 MP). Lasts 30 minutes.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: With Cthulhu Mythos knowledge, can track Mythos substances (Deep One spore, etc.).

spell_entry.name: Drain Youth

effect.description: Permanently drains 3D20 points of CON, STR, or APP from target. Opposed POW roll. Target suffers advanced aging effects.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Caster can possess the drained characteristic points for 24 hours (cost 12 MP).

spell_entry.name: Dread Curse of Azathoth
alternate_names: By the True Name Thy Power is Sapped

effect.description: Drains 3D6 POW from the target. Opposed POW roll. Repeating the secret name of Azathoth.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Caster consumes drained POW to increase their own.

spell_entry.name: Dream Vision
alternate_names: Scrying at the Door of Nightmares to Come

effect.description: Brings forth vivid dreams portending the future. May involve hallucinogens.
Target falls unconscious for 1D20 x 10 minutes. Opposed POW roll. Victims awake with nausea (penalty die).
Creates a grey-green powder harmful to unnatural beings from other planes. Requires mummy dust. Thrown dose deals 1D20 damage.
Target feels no pain for 1 hour. Ignores unconsciousness rolls. +2 temporary HP. Sanity losses delayed until spell ends.
Summons an incorporeal entity bound to a totem. Can observe. Becomes corporeal after absorbing 70 POW (via sacrifice).
Creates a spinning cylinder of blue mist. Hides those inside from creatures summoned by Nyarlathotep. Lasts 1D20+10 minutes.
Summons Yog-Sothoth's spherical forces as protection. Blocks Hounds of Tindalos. Requires Math/Physics skill.
Activates an Elder Sign. Makes a path unusable to minions of the Great Old Ones/Outer Gods. Does not protect a person carrying it effectively.
Renders target immobile and slows bodily functions. Target remains conscious but unresponsive for 1D6 hours. Requires poultice.

spell_entry.name: Embrace of Yog-Sothoth
alternate_names: The Purple Sign of the Opener of the Way

effect.description: Ages target to dust. Opposed POW roll. Target loses 5 CON per round until death.
Dreamlands only. Fires green energy dart dealing 1D3 damage (ignores armor). 4 MP per dart.
Doubles POW against one mental attack. Requires year of meditation training.

spell_entry.name: Enchant Amulet of The Old Ones

effect.description: Enchants a stone to provide +5 MP/day and +10% to Call Deity. Leeches 1D10 CON per month from wearer.
Enchants a soapstone animal carving. Spirit can be consulted for aid (4 MP, 1D4 SAN). Benefits vary by animal (e.g., Hawk: Spot Hidden bonus).
Creates 3 bells to summon Zu-Che-Quon. Requires bronze bells and 10 POW/1D6 SAN per bell.

spell_entry.name: Enchant Book

effect.description: Enchants a book to aid summoning Star Vampires. +2% success per POW invested. Ink must contain Star Vampire ichor.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Can create a book that automatically summons a creature when read.

effect.description: Enchants a brazier to aid spells (e.g., Conjure Glass of Mortlan). Requires animal sacrifice, gold dust/silver/mercury.
Enchants a candle to grant effects (skill increase, love). Supplicant must sacrifice 5 POW and 1D4 SAN upon use. Candle contains user's hair/blood.
Enchants a cane to drain MP/HP from others to store for the owner. Requires human sacrifice. Drains 1 MP/30 secs from toucher.
Enchants a club to deal +1 damage and harm magical creatures.
Enchants a flame-shaped dagger. Must kill 100 POW worth of beings. Stores POW from sacrifices to Nyarlathotep.
Enchants a doll with target's hair to cause pain when stabbed. If pin left in, target suffers penalty die.
Preserves and ensorcells skin/flesh (5 SIZ). Immune to damage. Can be grafted to armor caster and extend life. Lasts weeks equal to 1/5th original owner's POW.
Enchants a bag to grant skill bonuses. Owner sacrifices 5 POW, 1D4 SAN, and MP. +1% skill per MP sacrificed. Lasts 1D100+1 days.
Consecrates a personal ward against black magic. Evil voodoo denizens cannot come within 5 feet.
Enchants a knife (gold/iron) to aid spellcasting and harm magical creatures. +2% success to Summoning spells per POW invested.
Creates two staves (crook and ankh). Confers 2D10 extra MP and absorbs 1D10 spell damage when held crossed.
Enchants a portrait to allow telepathic communication with the subject. Viewer pays MP/SAN. Dangerous if subject is dead.
Enchants a ritual baton. Bonus die for Native Californian spells and Coyote Dust. Acts as club +1 damage.
Enchants pipes/flute. Requires animal sacrifice per 5 POW. Grants +2% success to Summon/Bind Servitor of Outer Gods per POW.
Enchants 1D4+4 projectiles (bullets, stones). Deals +1 damage and harms magical creatures.
Stores magic points in a recording of a song spell (e.g. Song of Hastur). MP invested can be used when recording is played.
Enchants a bone ring. Grants 8-point magical armor against projectiles/melee. Induces cannibalistic urges in wearer.
Accelerates a drug's effect by factor of 10. Requires human blood container.
Creates a spear that always hits. 1D10 damage, harms magical entities. Requires 2 years of ritual.
Enchants black stone from R'lyeh. Causes nightmares in possessor. If thrown in sea, returns via Deep Ones.

spell_entry.name: Enchant Torch

effect.description: Enchants an iron torch to burn without fuel. Aids Summon Fire Vampire.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Can set fire to heavy metals.

effect.description: Enchants meteorite metal whistle. +2% success to Summon Byakhee per POW invested.
Creates dust that destroys undead (mombies, zombies). Monster makes POW roll based on POW invested (5=Regular, 10=Hard, 15=Extreme).
Curses an object. Target wearing it has Luck halved and double fumble chance.

spell_entry.name: Endurance Chant
alternate_names: Flinch Not from the Travails of Struggle

effect.description: Increases CON and STR by 30 for 6 hours. Can ignore pain/shock. Risk of permanent CON loss.
Brings wealth ($100 per MP). Hard POW roll. Money comes via coincidence/accident, often with a sting.
Wards area against Hounds of Tindalos, Great Race mind transfer, and risen dead.
Creates Sign of Koth. Wards against nightmare creatures/undead. Allows scrying of Mythos locales. Requires human sacrifice.
Stuns target numb and dumb. Opposed POW roll.
Dreamlands only. Creates triangle screen to display images from caster's mind.
Curses target with bad luck (halved Luck, penalty die on skills, weapon jams/breaks). Lasts until midnight or dispelled.
Dreamlands only. Rips open victim. 1D6 damage per 8 MP.

spell_entry.name: Exaltation
alternate_names: Infuse the Blessed Relief of Troubles Past

effect.description: Temporarily restores Sanity (1D6 per 12 MP). Lasts 24 hours. Can cure temporary insanity. Permanent gain requires 5 POW sacrifice.
Traps Eihort in its labyrinth for a year and a day. Opposed roll vs POW 150.
Dreamlands only. Opposed POW. Explodes target's heart (Death).

spell_entry.name: Extend Life
alternate_names: The Ritual of Fire and Exchange

effect.description: Grants immortality via pact with ancient entity. Entity possesses caster upon death.
Creates a powerful warding sigil. Weakens/destroys Mythos minions (1 MP drain/hour). Disintegrates at 0 MP. Blocks Call/Contact/Summon spells.
Forces target to see what caster chooses (1D10+2 rounds). Opposed POW.

spell_entry.name: Eyes of the Zombie

effect.description: Allows caster to see through zombie's eyes. Requires swapping eyes with zombie.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Swap only one eye to see both views (sanity loss).

effect.description: Becomes a 'Fang of Yig' for 1D10 centuries. Gains POW reward. Slave to Yig.
Transfers owl into target's stomach. Owl eats out (8 damage). Target bleeds. 1D10 CON loss.
Brainwashes target via magical feast. Target loses POW/CON. Caster makes suggestions.
Locates a dreamer in Waking World or Dreamlands.
Reveals gates within vision.
Locates nearest Serpent Person.
Fireball leaps to target. 1D6 damage + burn.

spell_entry.name: Fist of Yog-Sothoth
alternate_names: Channel the Strength of the Opener of the Way
The Hideous Blast of the Foul One

effect.description: Invisible force strikes target. 1 MP = 2D10 STR. Target knocked back/unconscious.
Dreamlands only. Disk of flame blocks specific spells and damages touchers (1D6).
Brilliant flash blinds sighted beings. Damages non-corporeal creatures (25 damage per 5 POW).
Provides 1D6 armor per MP against non-magical attacks. Ablative.
Creates flying ointment. Lasts 1D6 hours. MOV 10.
Cannibalism extends life. 1 week per 5 SIZ consumed.
Causes localized weather events (lightning, hail, wind). Uncontrolled.
Allows Hastur to enter/remain in area bounded by monoliths. Requires 350 POW from chanters.
Induces berserk rage. Target attacks recklessly (2 attacks/round). Ignores unconsciousness.

spell_entry.name: Gate

effect.description: Creates a permanent or temporary portal between two locations. Permanent gates cost POW to build equal to distance (Log10 miles x 5). Use costs 1 MP per 100 miles (or 1 SAN).

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Certain powerful gates require no MP to use but exact a terrible price (aging, sanity).

effect.description: Creates a gate allowing physical entry into the Dreamlands. Requires POW investment. Use costs MP.
Causes a sudden storm to gather. Rain/Wind obscures vision.
Target becomes obsessed with the caster. Opposed POW roll. Obsession lasts until dispelled or object destroyed.
Attaches new flesh/limbs to a body. Can be used to heal severe wounds (regrow limbs) or create monstrosities. Requires fresh biological material.
Manifests spectral tentacles to crush a target. 1D6 STR per 2 MP. Tentacles grapple and crush (damage equal to damage bonus of the spectral STR).
Variant zombie creation. Uses a gray liquid distillate. Zombie is faster but decays quickly.
Allows caster to see detail at great distances (miles).
Infects target with a green, mossy rot. Target loses 1 CON per day. Sunlight slows it. Death results in transformation into a Servant of Gla'aki.
Transforms caster's hands into venomous snakes. 1D3 damage bite + potency 1D10 poison (1D10 damage). Lasts 1D6+1 rounds.

spell_entry.name: Healing

effect.description: Heals 1D6 hit points. Cannot resurrect the dead.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Can reattach recently severed limbs (requires high MP/SAN).

effect.description: Target becomes immune to fear and panic for 1 hour. Sanity losses still apply, but no temporary insanity.
Transforms target into a small tree or shrub. Target retains consciousness but cannot move/speak. Opposed POW roll to resist.
Creates a localized singularity/mouth that consumes matter. Targets in area take 3D6 damage. Armor is useless.
Reveals the identity/nature of a spirit or ghost. Caster knows who it was in life.
Creates realistic visual/auditory illusion of fire. No heat/damage. Targets must make INT roll to disbelieve.
Halts aging. Requires complex alchemical preparation. Must be renewed every 10 years.
Causes drowsiness and sleep. Targets must make opposed POW roll or fall asleep for 1D4 hours.
Invisible force impales target. 1D10 damage + bleeding. Ignores armor.

spell_entry.name: Implant Fear

effect.description: Target is overwhelmed by sudden, irrational fear. Must flee or cower for 1D6 rounds. Opposed POW roll.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Can target specific phobias for lasting effect.

effect.description: Traps target's mind within their own body or an object. Target is aware but cannot act.
Strengthens metal object. Increases durability/HP of item. Weapon deals +1 damage.
Target bursts into flames. 1D6 damage per round until extinguished.
Places target in hypnotic trance. Suggestible. Opposed POW roll.
Target compelled to follow one specific instruction. Opposed POW roll. Cannot be suicidal.
Instantly erects a secure campsite/shelter hidden from casual view.
Renders target invisible. Attacking or casting spells breaks the effect.
Grants bonus die to resist mental attacks/sanity loss for 1 hour.
Sends caster's spirit to another plane. Trance lasts 1D6+3 hours. High Sanity risk.
Dreamlands only. Increases temperature by 3¬∞F per MP invested. Can burn/boil enemies.
Two blood relatives join minds. One gains bonus die to INT rolls for 1 hour.
Twists target's limb into a knot. 1D8 damage, permanent 5 DEX loss. Opposed POW. Painful.
Hides life force in an egg. Caster becomes immune to death unless body destroyed or egg broken. At 0 HP, falls into coma.
Dreamlands only. Creates distracting patterns. Enveloped targets suffer penalty die to visual skills.
Dreamlands only. Creates flame on finger. Used for light or ignition.
Causes animal to go lame or heals it. Lame animals cannot work/move fast.
Dreamlands only. Puts target to sleep. Opposed POW.
Dreamlands only. Creates explosive spheres. Seek target. 3D6 damage area.
Levitates target. 1 MP per 5 SIZ. Can move target slowly.

spell_entry.name: Lift Veil
alternate_names: Call Upon the Parter of Veils

effect.description: Reveals higher dimensions to target. Causes massive Sanity loss (1/1D10 per round). May attract Tindalosians.
Calls Daoloth's avatar (The Sacred Light). Grants 'Gift of Truth' (cosmic awareness). Sanity loss.
Creates globe of light. Harms Haunter of the Dark (1D6 damage/MP). Dispels darkness.

spell_entry.name: Limbo Gate
alternate_names: Portal to the Realm of Spirit

effect.description: Opens portal to Limbo dimension. Travel requires 3 MP.
Turns target to liquid. Opposed POW. Death unless reversed or frozen.
Causes ulcers and organ liquefaction. Opposed POW. Death in 3 rounds.
Dreamlands only. Clothes become living flesh, crushing wearer (1D3 damage/round).
Dreamlands only. Immobilizes target in spread-eagled position. Opposed POW.
Shrinks caster. 1 MP = 5 SIZ reduction. Sanity cost 1 per 3 MP.
Hurls voluntary target into future. 5 POW per year traveled. Target returns after hours equal to 1/5 POW.
Creates maggots on target's skin. 1 damage every 4 mins. Lasts 1 hour. Sanity loss to witness/victim.
Dreamlands only. Knockout bolt. Unconscious for days. Damage equal to Caster POW/10.
Dreamlands only. Creates mandrake servant. Stats 1D6x5. POW boosts stats. Intelligent if INT boosted.
Wear flayed face of victim to assume likeness. Permanent until removed.
Dreamlands only. Target sprouts mouths. Drains 1 MP/minute. Unconscious at 0 MP. Opposed POW.
Variant of Liquid Death. Turns target into liquid. Opposed POW. Death unless reversed or frozen.
Implants a suggestion in the target's mind. Cost varies by complexity (3 to 10 MP). Opposed POW roll.
Drains 1 Magic Point from each participant in a ritual to empower the caster.
Partial impairment of thinking processes for 2D10 minutes. Opposed POW. Target becomes confused or forgets task.
Restores sanity to a mad person. Requires sacrifice (who is killed). Mad person bathes in blood/eats brain. Restores Sanity to equal POW.

spell_entry.name: Mind Exchange

effect.description: Swaps minds with target. Cost reduces with repeated use on same target (starts at 1/5 target's POW). Opposed POW roll.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Swap minds of two other individuals (double cost).

spell_entry.name: Mind Transfer

effect.description: Permanently swaps minds. Caster loses 1D10 SAN, target loses 2D10 SAN. Opposed POW. Failure dissipates caster's soul.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Prepared in advance to activate upon death.

effect.description: Target loses 5 Sanity points and suffers temporary insanity. Opposed POW roll.
Dreamlands only. Reduces target's SIZ by 5 per 8 MP. Permanent. Opposed POW.
Projects caster's image onto a mirror gazed into by target. Can communicate.
Dreamlands only. Wand creates blue light serpent. Turns target to stone. Can target multiple.
Drink poisonous infusion (2D10 damage). Mind travels Dreamlands. Wake energized (+20 STR, +20 CON vs poison) for 1 day.
Silver ball emits moonlight. Dispels darkness/mist/shadows. Reveals invisible creatures (Spot Hidden).
Redirects existing Gate to new location (must be closer than original). Cost is half creation cost of new distance.
Enchants necklace. Wearer becomes devoted to caster (Opposed POW). Cannot remove necklace.

spell_entry.name: Necrosis

effect.description: Delays effect 1D4 days. Target's hand necrotizes. Spreads to body after 6 days. 1 HP damage/day, accelerating to 1D4/day. Amputation required.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Cast at death (10 POW) to curse enemy.

effect.description: Modern Era. Projects consciousness into Internet. Uses INT/POW. Can hack/attack via terminals. Lose 1 MP/hour.
Causes horrific nightmare. 1D3 Sanity loss.

spell_entry.name: Nightmares
alternate_names: Bring Forth Thy Enemies Darkest Horror

effect.description: Causes waking hallucinations of darkest fears. Requires hair/nail clippings mixed with herbs fed to target daily. 13th night hallucinations begin.
Causes device/tool (gun, computer) to fail/jam/break. Lasts 1D10+2 days.
Target suffers immediate bout of madness (1D10 rounds). Opposed POW. Requires burning human liver.

spell_entry.name: Nyhargo Dirge

effect.description: Destroys single undead (zombie, skeleton, vampire). Opposed POW. Target turns to dust.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Target group (up to 8). Costs 20 MP, 1D10 SAN, 5 POW.

effect.description: Dreamlands only. Rectangular pattern blocks attacking spells. Lasts 10 rounds.
Dreamlands only. Dismisses dreamer from Dreamlands permanently. Destroys dream form.
Dreamlands only. Rigid wall 1 yard side per 6 MP. STR 100. Lasts 1 hour.
Creates invisible area. Those entering see lights/sounds. POW/INT/EDU/Skills halved. Lasts 1 hour.

spell_entry.name: Pact of Quachil Uttaus

effect.description: Pact protects caster from death/aging. Spine deformed. If Quachil Uttaus contacted, he takes pact holder.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Reading "Forbidden Words" in Testament of Carnamagos activates spell.

spell_entry.name: Parting Sands
alternate_names: The Grain that Unlocks the Sea

effect.description: Parts non-living obstacles (walls, rivers). 2 MP + 1 per 5 SIZ of obstacle.
Dreamlands only. Target invisible (must be naked). Audible.

spell_entry.name: Paws of the Bear

effect.description: Enchants bear paws to animate and attack. 1D10 damage. 10 MP activation + 1 MP/round.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Trap trigger. Gain control of others' paws.

spell_entry.name: Perceive Text

effect.description: Read in darkness/blind. 1 MP per 6 hours.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Insanity while reading Mythos tome releases spells.

spell_entry.name: Perfection
alternate_names: Transmutation of the Mind to Flesh

effect.description: Convert POW to other characteristics (1 for 1). Lasts 1 week. Deity permission required.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Longer duration. Drain char from victim to self.

effect.description: Alchemical liquid turns drinker to stone. Opposed POW vs (MP x 5). Permanent.
Turns target's legs to stone. Lasts 1D10 hours. Opposed POW.

spell_entry.name: Pipes of Madness
alternate_names: The Dark Song of the Heavens

effect.description: Requires enchanted bone pipe. Listeners lose 5 SAN + Insanity (fail SAN) or 1D3 SAN (pass SAN).
Infection. 1D3 HP/day for 1D3 days. Sickened. Duration extension for MP.

spell_entry.name: Pose Mundane

effect.description: Masks creature/object. Ignored by viewers. Cost 1/5 SIZ in MP.

spell_entry.deeper_magic: Human target (POW cost). Prolonged invisibility causes Sanity loss.

spell_entry.name: Possess Corpse
alternate_names: Instill Thy Will into the Decaying Flesh

effect.description: Possess corpse for 10 mins. Caster body comatose. Risk of death on return.
Permanently possess living human. Opposed POW. Caster memory lost while in body.
Reveals invisible things for 10 heartbeats. Requires special ingredients.
Temporarily doubles MP. Lasts until sunrise/sunset.

spell_entry.name: Power Drain
alternate_names: Sup of the Elixir of Power

effect.description: Steals 1D6 MP from target. Opposed POW. Drains HP if MP depleted.
Grants 2D6 MP. Excess MP do not regenerate.
Removes bones from corpse. For storage.
Enchants Ankh to banish Mythos creatures. Group chant adds MP.
Dampens presence. People ignore caster. Lasts 1 month. Opposed POW to notice.
+2 MOV, +10 DEX for 4 rounds. Successive use risks CON loss/unconsciousness.
Grows Fog-Spawn from larva. Controlled 3 hours.

spell_entry.name: Quicken the Voice of the Deep

effect.description: Gives gills for 24 hours. Lose 1D6 CON if cast repeatedly.
Dreamlands only. Raises skeletons/corpses. 1 MP per SIZ 5. No control.
Dreamlands only. Summons Ghost of Ib. Attacks target (Grasp of Doom).
Creates dense fog at night/near water. 100 yard radius.
Dreamlands only. Target attacks friends. Opposed POW.
Move through solid objects (walls). Lasts 1 round. Risk of rematerializing inside object.
Raises corpse (partial or whole). Requires formula (Herbert West). Intelligence/sanity varies.
Creates glowing red sign. Damages all within range (1D3 within 10 yards, 1 within 30).
Manifests dead person known to caster for 5 mins. Can speak/move.
Shows ghost re-enacting death. Cannot communicate.

spell_entry.name: Removal of Favor
alternate_names: Destroy Manifestations of the Toad King

effect.description: Destroys Tsathoggua homunculi. Opposed POW vs creator.

spell_entry.name: Rend Veil
alternate_names: Sunder Enemy to the Farthest Reach

effect.description: Tears reality, sending target to other dimension/time. Opposed POW. Target lost.
Song repels Shan. Range 5ft per MP. Shan flee or writhe (Opposed POW).
Regain 1D6 SAN. Fumble loses 1D6.

spell_entry.name: Resurrection
alternate_names: The Rite of Knowledge Long Lost

effect.description: Resurrects dead from essential salts. Reverse to destroy (Opposed POW).
Forces bound monster to attack summoner. Opposed POW vs summoner.
Creates simulacrum of recently dead. Reduced stats. Lasts 1 day per MP.
Opens/Closes Gate to Gla'aki's dimension. Requires INT 90+.
